name: Darkness, 15' Radius
summary: Darkness, 15' Radius (Alteration) aus dem AD&D 2e Player's Handbook.

source_text.raw_block:
Darkness, 15' Radius (Alteration)
Range: 10 yarddlevel
Components: V, S, M
Duration: 1 turn + 1 round/level
Casting Time: 2
Area of Effect: '15-foot radius
Saving Throw: None
This spell causes total, impenetrable
darkness in the area of effect. Infravision is
useless. Neither normal nor magical lat
works unless a light or continual light spell
is used. In the former event, the darkness
spell is negated by the light spell and vice
versa.
The material components of this spell are
a bit of bat fur and either a drop of pitch or a
piece of coal.
